briefdescription.para: Parses an RTS to see if it is valid.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called to validate an RTS buffer. It parses through the RTS to make sure all of the commands look in reasonable shape.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the area to validate

briefdescription.para: Buids the Time index buffer for the ATS.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine builds the ATS Time Index Table after an ATS buffer has been loaded and the ATS Command Index Table has been built. This routine will take the commands that are pointed to by the pointers in the command index table and sort the commands by time order.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Inserts an item in a sorted list.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function will insert a new element into the list of ATS commands sorted by execution time.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: ATS command index for new list element
Number of elements currently in list

briefdescription.para: Initializes ATS tables before a load starts.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function simply clears out the ats tables in preparation for a load.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Validation function for ATS or Append ATS table data.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called to validate the contents of an ATS or Apppend ATS table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Validation function for a single ATS or Append ATS table entry.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called to validate the contents of a single ATS or Append ATS table entry.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

entry.para: Returns 0 if no more entries in the table
Returns -1 if the current entry is invalid
Returns positive integer equal to table entry length (in words)

briefdescription.para: Loads an ATS into the data structures in SC.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called when the SC app gets a new ATS table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called from the cFE Table Services and passed as a parameter in the cFE Table Registration call.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Validation function for the Append ATS Table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called from the cFE Table Services as part of the table load/validate/commit process. The function pointer is passed as a parameter in the cFE Table Registration call.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Updates Append ATS Info table per new contents of Append ATS table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called when the SC app receives notification from cFE Table Services that the Append ATS table contents have been updated.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Appends contents of Append ATS table to indicated ATS table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called from the Append ATS command handler to append the contents of the Append ATS table to the end of the indicated ATS table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Loads an RTS into the data structures in SC.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called when the SC app gets a new RTS table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine is called from the cFE Table Services and passed as a parameter in the cFE Table Registration call.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
